casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2008-1252. Dayton v. State.

Montgomery App. No. 22221, 176 Ohio App.3d 469, 2008-Ohio-2589. Discretionary appeal accepted; *1502cause held for the decisions in 2008-0128, Lima v. State, Allen App. No. 1-07-21, 2007-0hio-6419, and 2008-0418, State v. Akron, Summit App. No. 23660, 2008-Ohio-38; and briefing schedule stayed.
